item.title: APU Battery – Airplanes without Main/APU Battery Tie System

numlitem.para: APU battery is deactivated or removed, and

note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).

numlitem.para: If APU battery is removed, the weight unit correction is -100.2. Subtract 100 lbs. from the ZFW and TOW. Subtract 0.2 MAC Units from the ZFW CG and TOW CG, then verify the aircraft is still within CG limits.

note.para: An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an in flight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "APU BATTERY INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar APU BAT CHGR circuit breaker (E4) on E6 rack.
Open and collar APU BAT CHGR circuit breaker (B5) on P37 panel.
Remove Thermal Sensor connector – cap and stow.
